original_text: Elpaal's sons were: Eber, Misham, Shemed, Beriah and Shema. Shemed built the towns of Ono and Lod, and the villages around them. Beriah and Shema were leaders of the clans that lived in Aijalon city. They chased the people of Gath out of their city.
korean_text: 또 브리아와 세마이니 그들은 아얄론 주민의 우두머리가 되어 그들이 가드 주민을 쫓아냈더라

sentences.original_text: Elpaal's sons were: Eber, Misham, Shemed, Beriah and Shema.
sentences.korean_translation: 엘팔의 아들들은 에벨, 미삼, 세메드, 브리야와 세마였습니다.

sentences.original_text: Shemed built the towns of Ono and Lod
Beriah and Shema were leaders of the clans
They chased the people of Gath
